price: 65 où ils demeureront à jamais sans trouver ni soutien, ni protecteur.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
